faq.label: Questions Solved
faq.title: Expertise that Generates Peace of Mind
faq.subtitle: We know renovations generate questions. Here we answer the most common ones with the honesty that characterizes us.

items.question: How long does a comprehensive renovation take in Mallorca?
items.answer: Time varies by complexity, but a standard comprehensive renovation usually takes between 3 and 5 months. At Express Renovation Mallorca, we guarantee fixed deadlines by contract thanks to our pre-planning with 3D technology, avoiding common industry delays.

items.question: Do you handle building permits?
items.answer: Yes, we handle the entire bureaucratic process. From applying for municipal licenses (major or minor works) to managing public road occupation. Our technical team knows each town hall's regulations in detail.

items.question: Can I see the design before starting work?
items.answer: Absolutely. It is a fundamental part of our Express Method. We develop photorealistic renders and detailed plans before laying the first brick, ensuring the final result matches your vision exactly.

items.question: Do you work with a closed budget?
items.answer: Yes. Our transparency policy eliminates surprises. Once the design and materials are approved, the price is fixed, unless you decide to make changes during construction.
